CustomField.description: Disables the Apex trigger for FeedItem undeletes. If this is checked, then feedItemUndeleted subscriptions will not be available.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Disables the Apex trigger for FeedItem undeletes. If this is checked, then feedItemUndeleted subscriptions will not be available.
CustomField.label: Disable FeedItem Undelete Trigger
